hero.title: S&S Messebau – Exhibition Stands 20–200 m²
hero.subtitle: Full-service exhibition construction from NRW – 48h quote with personal consultation
cta.free3d.desc: When you commission your project, we create an individual 3D visualization of your exhibition stand – so you can see in advance how your stand will look.
blog.title: Blog & Guide – Exhibition Tips from S&S Messebau
blog.subtitle: Helpful tips, checklists and expert knowledge about exhibition construction, event planning and successful trade show appearances.
blog.cta.title: Have questions about your exhibition project?
blog.cta.subtitle: Our experts are happy to personally advise you on all aspects of your trade show appearance.
branchen.title: Industry Expertise – Exhibition Construction for Food, Finance & Industry
branchen.subtitle: Specialized in the requirements of mid-sized companies in Food, Insurance and Industry. We know your sector and understand what matters.
branchen.expertise.title: Why Industry Expertise Matters
branchen.expertise.subtitle: Every industry has specific requirements. We know them and deliver accordingly.
leistungen.title: Exhibition Services – Full Service from 20–200 m²
leistungen.subtitle: From the initial idea to professional dismantling – we accompany you through every phase of your exhibition project. Our full-service approach saves time, costs and stress.
leistungen.sustainability.title: Sustainability Is Our Standard
leistungen.sustainability.intro: Sustainability is not an add-on – we build resource-efficiently by default. At S&S Messebau, every stand is a sustainability project.
leistungen.sustainability.co2.title: CO₂ Offset for Transport
leistungen.sustainability.co2.desc: We offset our transport journeys with certified CO₂ compensation – for a climate-conscious trade show appearance.
leistungen.sustainability.systembau.desc: We consistently rely on modular systems that are reused and adapted – no disposables, no waste.
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.title: Every Stand a Sustainability Project
leistungen.sustainability.projekt.desc: Every project is planned with sustainability in mind: materials, logistics, reuse – considered from the very start.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.title: How We Live Sustainability – Every Day
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text1: Our team drives with CO₂ offset, no parts end up in the trash – our comeback system and consistent repair come before disposal.
leistungen.sustainability.anecdote.text2: Reusable elements are professionally stored after each trade show and prepared for the next deployment. This saves our clients up to 60% of materials – while protecting the environment.
leistungen.sustainability.outro: Find details, facts and certificates about our sustainable approach on our Sustainability page.
sustainability.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction
sustainability.subtitle: Environmentally conscious, cost-efficient, future-oriented – our approach to sustainable exhibition construction.
sustainability.reuse.desc: Modular stand systems that can be used across multiple trade shows – saving materials and costs.
sustainability.materials.desc: FSC-certified wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials for an environmentally conscious presentation.
sustainability.logistics.desc: Optimized transport planning and bundled deliveries reduce CO₂ emissions.
sustainability.savings.desc: From the 2nd trade show onwards, sustainable systems pay for themselves – good for the environment and your budget.
sustainability.branchen.title: Sustainable Exhibition Construction for Every Industry
sustainability.branchen.subtitle: Environmentally conscious trade show presence – without compromising quality and impact.
sustainability.branchen.reuse.desc: Modular stands that can be used multiple times – saving up to 60% of materials.
sustainability.branchen.materials.desc: FSC wood, LED lighting and recyclable materials as standard.
sustainability.branchen.logistics.desc: Regional partners, bundled transports and CO₂-optimized planning.
sustainability.branchen.savings.desc: Sustainable systems pay for themselves from the 2nd trade show.

inquiry.title: Non-binding Project Consultation
inquiry.desc: We will get back to you within 24 hours with initial ideas and a rough cost estimate for your exhibition stand or construction project.

home.hero.badge: S&S Messebau – Your Exhibition Partner from NRW
home.hero.title: Exhibition Stands 20–200 m² That Sell Your Brand.
home.hero.subtitle: S&S Messebau – 48h quote with personal consultation. Full-service exhibition construction, event construction & showrooms for Food, Finance and Industry – nationwide from NRW.
home.hero.alt: Professional exhibition construction by S&S Messebau – Exhibition stands, events and shop fitting from Hückelhoven
home.services.title: Our Services
home.services.subtitle: Three service areas, one contact person: Full-service exhibition construction as core service, scalable tour solutions for recurring appearances and professional showrooms & brand spaces – all cost-optimized from one source.
home.services.messebau.title: Full-Service Exhibition Construction
home.services.messebau.desc: Your core service from one source – from the initial idea through production and logistics to storage for the next deployment.
home.services.messebau.b3: Storage and reuse of stand components
home.services.touren.title: Tours & Recurring Trade Show Appearances
home.services.touren.desc: Scalable system solutions for many small trade shows and roadshows – centrally coordinated from NRW, available nationwide.
home.services.touren.b1: Central logistics from NRW – short distances, quick response
home.services.touren.b2: Reusable system stands, deployable multiple times
home.services.touren.b4: Scalable packages for the entire DACH region
home.services.showrooms.title: Showrooms & Brand Spaces
home.services.showrooms.desc: Showrooms, brand experience spaces and brand spaces – planning and execution with the same specialist team you know from exhibition construction.
home.services.showrooms.b1: Showrooms, brand spaces and experience rooms
home.services.showrooms.b2: Planning and execution from one source
home.services.showrooms.b3: Same assembly team as in exhibition construction
home.advantages.title: Why S&S Messebau?
home.advantages.subtitle: Three decisive advantages that make us the ideal partner for your trade show appearance.
home.advantages.offer.title: 48h Quote with Personal Consultation
home.advantages.offer.desc: Within 48 hours you receive a calculated quote including individual concept consultation for your exhibition stand – for quick decisions.
home.advantages.specialist.title: Specialist for 20–200 m²
home.advantages.specialist.desc: Focused on exhibition stands for mid-sized companies. Perfect for Food, Finance and Industry sectors – without agency overhead.
home.advantages.expert.title: Industry Expert with Network
home.advantages.expert.desc: Deep industry knowledge in Food (Anuga, ISM), Insurance (DKM) and Industry (Hannover Messe) – plus strong partner network for best quality.
home.references.title: Portfolio
home.references.subtitle: Selected projects from Food, Finance & Industry – from 20 to 200 m².
home.testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
home.testimonials.subtitle: Real reviews from real clients
home.testimonials.t1.text: Perfect stand, set up on time and very professional. The collaboration was straightforward and the result convinces us and our trade show visitors.
home.testimonials.t1.author: M. S.
home.testimonials.t2.text: S&S Messebau accompanied us from initial planning to dismantling. Absolutely recommended for anyone who values quality and personal support.
home.testimonials.t2.author: J. B.
home.testimonials.t3.text: Fair prices, creative solutions and a team that thinks ahead. Our showroom turned out exactly as we imagined.
home.testimonials.t3.author: T. W.
